columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique universal identifier of this node pool.

columns.name: cluster_id
columns.description: The unique universal identifier of the associated cluster.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The globally unique human-readable name for the node pool.

columns.name: auto_scale
columns.description: A boolean value indicating whether the node pool has autoscaling enabled.

columns.name: count
columns.description: The number of nodes in the node pool.

columns.name: max_nodes
columns.description: The maximum number of nodes allowed in the node pool.

columns.name: min_nodes
columns.description: The minimum number of nodes allowed in the node pool.

columns.name: size
columns.description: The size of the node pool.

columns.name: urn
columns.description: The uniform resource name (URN) for the node pool.

columns.name: labels
columns.description: The labels for the node pool.

columns.name: nodes
columns.description: The nodes available in the node pool.

columns.name: taints
columns.description: The taints of the node pool.
